mapper.select: select TB_GROUP_CARD.GROUP_CARD_ID, TB_GROUP_CARD.GROUP_CARD_NO, TB_GROUP_CARD.BEGIN_MONEY, TB_GROUP_CARD.NOW_MONEY, TB_GROUP_CARD.CARD_STATE, TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL.SEND_TIMES, TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL.SURPLUS_TIMES, BLAND_WEEK, SEND_WEEK, TB_GROUP.GROUP_ID, TB_GROUP.NAME, TB_GROUP.PRICE, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE from TB_GROUP_CARD inner join TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL on TB_GROUP_CARD.GROUP_CARD_NO=TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL.GROUP_CARD_NO and IS_VEGETABLES_GROUP=1 inner join TB_GROUP on TB_GROUP.GROUP_ID=TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL.GROUP_ID where BEGIN_DATE <= CONVERT(varchar(100), GETDATE(), 23) and end_date >= CONVERT(varchar(100), GETDATE(), 23) and TB_GROUP_CARD.GROUP_CARD_NO=#{value}
select count(1) from TB_GROUP_DETAIL where GROUP_ID = #{value} and PRICE > 0
select GROUP_DETAIL_ID, GROUP_ID, SERIAL, NAME, SPEC, NUM, PRICE, MEMO from TB_GROUP_DETAIL where PRICE = 0

select TB_GROUP_OPTIONAL_PRODUCT.SERIAL, TB_GROUP_OPTIONAL_PRODUCT.SPEC, TB_PRODUCT.NAME, TB_PRODUCT_INFO.SMALLPIC from TB_GROUP_OPTIONAL_PRODUCT inner join TB_PRODUCT on TB_GROUP_OPTIONAL_PRODUCT.SERIAL = TB_PRODUCT.SERIAL left join TB_PRODUCT_INFO on TB_PRODUCT.SERIAL=TB_PRODUCT_INFO.SERIAL
mapper.update: update TB_GROUP_CARD set NOW_MONEY=#{NOW_MONEY} where GROUP_CARD_ID=#{GROUP_CARD_ID}
mapper.select: select GROUP_CARD_ID, GROUP_CARD_NO, BEGIN_MONEY, NOW_MONEY, CARD_STATE, CARD_TYPE_ID, BUY_MAN, IS_GIVE, IS_ONLINE_SALE, MEMO, RECHARGE_CUSTOMER_ID from TB_GROUP_CARD where GROUP_CARD_ID=#{value}

select GROUP_CARD_ID, GROUP_CARD_NO, BEGIN_MONEY, NOW_MONEY, CARD_STATE, TB_GROUP_CARD.CARD_TYPE_ID, TB_CARD_TYPE.NAME as CARD_TYPE_NAME, BUY_MAN, IS_GIVE, TB_GROUP_CARD.MEMO, CREATE_TIME, TB_GROUP_CARD.RECHARGE_CUSTOMER_ID from TB_GROUP_CARD left join TB_CARD_TYPE on TB_CARD_TYPE.CARD_TYPE_ID=TB_GROUP_CARD.CARD_TYPE_ID where GROUP_CARD_NO=#{value}
mapper.update: update TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL set NEW_GROUP_CARD_NO=#{NEW_GROUP_CARD_NO}, SEND_TIMES=#{SEND_TIMES}, SURPLUS_TIMES=#{SURPLUS_TIMES}, GIVE_TIMES=#{GIVE_TIMES}, UPDATE_USER=#{UPDATE_USER}, UPDATE_TIME=#{UPDATE_TIME} where GROUP_CARD_DETAIL_ID=#{GROUP_CARD_DETAIL_ID}
update TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL set SEND_DATE=#{SEND_DATE}, BLAND_WEEK=#{BLAND_WEEK}, SEND_WEEK=#{SEND_WEEK}, MEMO=#{MEMO} where GROUP_CARD_DETAIL_ID=#{GROUP_CARD_DETAIL_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL (GROUP_CARD_DETAIL_ID, GROUP_CARD_NO, NEW_GROUP_CARD_NO, SEND_TIMES, SURPLUS_TIMES, GIVE_TIMES, IS_VEGETABLES_GROUP, GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, SEND_DATE, BLAND_WEEK, SEND_WEEK, MEMO, DELTE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{GROUP_CARD_DETAIL_ID}, #{GROUP_CARD_NO}, #{NEW_GROUP_CARD_NO}, #{SEND_TIMES}, #{SURPLUS_TIMES}, #{GIVE_TIMES}, #{IS_VEGETABLES_GROUP}, #{GROUP_ID}, #{GROUP_NAME}, #{SEND_DATE}, #{BLAND_WEEK}, #{SEND_WEEK}, #{MEMO}, #{DELTE_FLAG}, #{CREATE_USER}, #{CREATE_TIME}, #{UPDATE_USER}, #{UPDATE_TIME})
mapper.select: select GROUP_CARD_DETAIL_ID, GROUP_CARD_NO, SEND_TIMES, SURPLUS_TIMES, IS_VEGETABLES_GROUP, GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, SEND_DATE, BLAND_WEEK, SEND_WEEK, MEMO from TB_GROUP_CARD_DETAIL where GROUP_CARD_DETAIL_ID=#{groupCardDetailId}
